identifier.help: The unique identifier of this metadata file or object.

shortName.help: A short name that describes the resource, sometimes a filename.

title.help: A brief description of the resource, providing enough detail to differentiate it from other similar resources.

originator.help: The 'originator' element provides the full name of the person, organization, or position associated with the resource.

individualName.help: The full name of the person being described

salutation.help: The salutation field is used in addressing an individual with a particular title, such as Dr., Ms., Mrs., Mr., etc.

givenName.help: The given name field is used for the first name of the individual associated with the resource.

surName.help: The surname field is used for the last name of the individual associated with the resource.

organizationName.help: This field is intended to describe which institution or overall organization is associated with the resource being described.

positionName.help: The name of the title or position associated with the resource.

address.help: The full address information for a given responsible party entry.

deliveryPoint.help: The delivery point field is used for the physical address for postal communication.

city.help: The city field is used for the city name of the contact associated with a particular resource.

administrativeArea.help: The administrative area field is the equivalent of a state in the U.S., or province in Canada.

postalCode.help: The postal code is equivalent to a U.S. zip code

country.help: The country field is used for the name of the contact's country.

electronicMailAddress.help: The electronic mail address is the email address for the party.

onlineLink.help: A link to associated online information, usually a web site.

abstract.help: This field provides a container for one or more paragraph fields that give a brief overview of the resource that is being documented.

paragraph.help: This field is intended for the text of an abstract that gives a brief overview of the resource.

keywordSet.help: The 'keywordSet' element is a container for the keyword and keywordThesaurus fields.

keyword.help: This field names a keyword or keyphrase that concisely describes the resource

keywordThesaurus.help: The name of a thesaurus from which the keyword is derived.

additionalInfo.help: Any extra information pertitent to the resource.

triple.help: The definition of a relationship between component objects in a resource package

subject.help: Subject is the identifier of the metadata object or file that is the actor in the triple.

relationship.help: Relationship is a descriptive phrase that specifies the how the subject of the triple is related to the object.

object.help: Object is the identifier of the metadata or data object that is acted upon according to the relationship in the triple.

temporalCoverage.help: This element specifies temporal coverage, and allows coverages to be a single point in time, multiple points in time, or a range of dates.

geographicCoverage.help: Geographic Coverage is a container for spatial information about a project, a resource, or an entity within a resource.

taxonomicCoverage.help: Taxonomic Coverage is a container for Taxonomic information about a project, a resource, or an entity within a resource.
